explains: n. 范围，权限；视界；条款

sentences.en: That, however, was beyond the purview of the court; it was a diplomatic matter.
sentences.cn: 然而，那已超出了法庭的受理范畴，属于外交事宜。

sentences.en: For generations, these decisions were the exclusive purview of doctors;
sentences.cn: 一代一代地传下来，这些决定都是属于医生的专属范围；

sentences.en: This shows just how far a financial supervisor's purview now extends.
sentences.cn: 这也显示出现在这个金融监管者的管理范围能有多大的延伸。
